```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(e1071)
require(RCurl)
require(repmis)
require(randomForest)
proj2path="/home/fabs/PROJECTP2/"

eval(parse(text = myfunctions))
load(paste(proj2path,"data2017/modeldata_sGUkartiert.RData",sep=""))
```
